meanings.definition: The edible parts of an animal that are served alongside the main dish.
meanings.sent1: The sidemeats of the turkey were delicious with the Thanksgiving dinner.
meanings.sent2: I always enjoy the variety of sidemeats at a barbecue.
meanings.sent3: The sidemeats decided to have a party while the main dish was cooking.
meanings.sent4: The sidemeats added flavor to the meal like a secret ingredient.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the sidemeats filled the kitchen, making everyone hungry.

meanings.definition: The side dishes or accompaniments served with a meal.
meanings.sent1: Don't forget to prepare the sidemeats for the family dinner.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant offers a variety of sidemeats to complement the main course.
meanings.sent3: The sidemeats were having a race to see who would be eaten first.
meanings.sent4: The sidemeats were like loyal friends, always there to support the main dish.
meanings.sent5: The colorful sidemeats on the plate made the meal look more appetizing.
